#include <iostream>
#include <math.h>
using namespace std;


int main() {
    long long t, a3, a3l, s, n, d, a, j;

    cin >> t;
    for (int i = 0; i < t; i++) {
        cin >> a3 >> a3l >> s;

        n = (s * 2)/(a3 + a3l);
        cout << n << endl;
        d = (a3l - a3) / (n - 5);

        a = (a3 - (2 * d));

        for (j = 0; j < n; j++) {
            cout << a << " ";
            a += d;
        }
        cout << endl;
    }

    return 0;
}
